items.name: Banana
items.comment: It's not only a yummy fruit, it's also packed with important nutrients such as vitamin A, B and C, magnesium, potassium, iron and fibre. In addition to that, they are naturally free of salt, cholesterol and fat.

items.name: Carrot
items.comment: A single carrot covers the entire daily requirement of vitamin A!

items.name: Broccoli
items.comment: Contains vitamin C and K, antioxidants, folic acid, calcium... well, the list can be made almost endless of all the benefits it contains!
